verses.verse: And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon your <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and I will speak unto <S%H1696>you<s%>.

And the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into me when he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H5975>me<s%>, and set me upon my <S%H7272>feet<s%>, that I <S%H8085>heard<s%> him that spoke unto <S%H1696>me<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, I <S%H7971>send<s%> you to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to a <S%H4775>rebellious<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> that has <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against <S%H1>me<s%>: they and their fathers have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against <S%H6106>me<s%>, even unto this very <S%H3117>day<s%>.

For they are <S%H7186>impudent<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H2389>stiffhearted<s%>. I do <S%H7971>send<s%> you unto <S%H559>them<s%>; and you shall say unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

And <S%H8085>they<s%>, whether they will hear, or whether they will <S%H2308>forbear<s%>, (for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>,) yet shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that there has been a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

And <S%H1121>you<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H3372>them<s%>, neither be afraid of their <S%H1697>words<s%>, though <S%H5621>briars<s%> and <S%H5544>thorns<s%> be with <S%H3427>you<s%>, and you do live among <S%H6137>scorpions<s%>: be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of their <S%H1697>words<s%>, nor be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H6440>looks<s%>, though they be a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> unto <S%H8085>them<s%>, whether they will hear, or whether they will <S%H2308>forbear<s%>: for they are most <S%H4805>rebellious<s%>.

But <S%H1121>you<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> what I <S%H1696>say<s%> unto <S%H1961>you<s%>; Be not <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> like that <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>: <S%H6475>open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> what I give <S%H5414>you<s%>.
And when I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H3027>behold<s%>, a hand was <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto <S%H4039>me<s%>; and, behold, a roll of a book was in <S%H5612>it<s%>;

And he <S%H6566>spread<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3789>me<s%>; and it was written on both the <S%H6440>inside<s%> and the <S%H268>outside<s%>: and there was <S%H3789>written<s%> in it <S%H7015>lamentations<s%>, and <S%H1899>mourning<s%>, and <S%H1958>woe<s%>.
